enhanced_passive_voice_rules.text: Convert passive voice 'is displayed' to active alternatives: 'shows', 'appears', 'presents', 'renders on screen'
examples: Change 'data is displayed' to 'the system shows data'
Change 'information is displayed' to 'the interface presents information'
Change 'results are displayed' to 'the application renders results'

enhanced_passive_voice_rules.text: Convert passive voice 'are generated' to active alternatives: 'creates', 'produces', 'builds', 'constructs'
examples: Change 'logs are generated' to 'the system creates logs'
Change 'reports are generated' to 'the application produces reports'
Change 'files are generated' to 'the process builds files'

enhanced_passive_voice_rules.text: Convert passive voice 'are configured' to active alternatives: 'you set up', 'you arrange', 'you customize', 'you adjust'
examples: Change 'settings are configured' to 'you configure settings'
Change 'options are configured' to 'you set up options'
Change 'parameters are configured' to 'you customize parameters'

enhanced_passive_voice_rules.text: Convert passive voice 'are processed' to active alternatives: 'handles', 'manages', 'executes', 'runs through'
examples: Change 'data is processed' to 'the system handles data'
Change 'files are processed' to 'the application manages files'
Change 'requests are processed' to 'the service executes requests'

enhanced_passive_voice_rules.text: Convert passive voice 'are fixed' to active alternatives: 'locks', 'secures', 'stabilizes', 'anchors in place'
examples: Change 'columns are fixed' to 'the system locks columns'
Change 'values are fixed' to 'the interface secures values'
Change 'settings are fixed' to 'the application anchors settings'

enhanced_passive_voice_rules.text: Convert passive voice 'cannot be removed' to active alternatives: 'prevents deletion', 'blocks removal', 'ensures permanence'
examples: Change 'cannot be removed' to 'the system prevents deletion'
Change 'cannot be deleted' to 'the interface blocks removal'
Change 'cannot be changed' to 'the application ensures permanence'

enhanced_passive_voice_rules.text: Use variety in technical writing subjects: 'system', 'application', 'interface', 'platform', 'software', 'service'
examples: The system displays...
The application manages...
The interface presents...
The platform handles...
The software processes...
The service executes...
You configure the settings
Users can modify the options
Operators control the parameters
Administrators manage the system
Developers customize the interface

enhanced_passive_voice_rules.text: Alternative action verbs for technical writing: 'enables/allows', 'provides/offers', 'supports/facilitates', 'delivers/supplies'
examples: The feature enables customization
The system provides flexibility
The interface supports navigation
The platform delivers performance

enhanced_passive_voice_rules.text: Progressive and continuous alternatives: 'becomes visible', 'gets created', 'starts showing', 'begins processing'
examples: Data becomes visible in the panel
The report gets created automatically
Information starts showing on screen
The system begins processing requests
